===============================

[![AppVeyor Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/certifiedwaif/blma?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/certifiedwaif/blma)

Linux and Mac installation instructions
---------------------------------------
If you have libgsl installed,

```r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_devtools("certifiedwaif/blma")```

should install and build the package.

Windows installation instructions
---------------------------------
Our package depends on the GNU Scientific Library to evaluate special functions. On Windows, download
[local323.zip](http://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/Rtools/goodies/multilib/local323.zip) and unzip it in the directory
of your R installation. Then you can run

```r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_devtools("certifiedwaif/blma")```

to install and build the package.
